content_blocks.subheading_html: The easiest and most versatile Google My Business plugin for WordPress

blocks.content_html: Add your existing WordPress content in bulk and let the plugin publish it randomly at a predefined schedule.

blocks.heading_html: Publish posts to multiple locations across multiple accounts at once
blocks.content_html: Select one or more locations to publish your post to. Supports publishing to multiple locations across multiple Google accounts.
Never forget about creating a future post again. Define a publishing date, and your post will be automatically published to Google My Business when the date is reached.

content_blocks.quote_text: Hydra has shaped the business we have today. We have a repeatable sales process and a strategy to scale our team. I recommend Hydra to any business looking to improve their sales.
content_blocks.name: Jim James

reviews.name: Robert Budgen, SteelTown Smokers
reviews.review_text: Works great, I was a little confused at first. But a quick email and a fast response explained the process and away we went. Does exactly what it says on the can. Set it, forget it, and Google my business is updated as we update our site.

reviews.name: James Rich, M’agency
reviews.review_text: This plugin has some great functionality. And it’s getting better and better. I reached out to the developer and suggested some features. We had some great dialogue and I can see this plugin only getting better and better.

reviews.name: Lintay
reviews.review_text: This plugin saves you mountains of time, especially if you have more the one location in Google My Business. I had a little trouble getting it to work correctly but with all the support I got from Koen, I have everything working as it’s been designed.

reviews.name: goddessonthego4u
reviews.review_text: This Google My Business Free plugin makes it easy for me to share new content from my site on Google. Making it easier for people to learn about my business and all that I do.

updates.title: Evergreen content
updates.content_text: Randomly publish your existing WordPress content based on a predefined schedule. Old content can easily be selected & added in bulk.

reviews.name: WPLift
reviews.review_text: "If you work with Google My Business a lot – either for your own projects or client sites – Post to Google My Business can save you a ton of time and make your workflow a lot easier."

reviews.name: ThemeCircle
reviews.review_text: "If you’re looking to simplify your marketing efforts and keep them all within the same platform, Post to GMB will definitely do the trick!"

reviews.name: Tidy Repo
reviews.review_text: "To put it bluntly: if you’re using Google My Business, you should also use the Post to Google My Business plugin."

reviews.name: wpengine
reviews.review_text: "The Post to Google My Business plugin helps you save time by creating GMB posts directly from your WordPress dashboard."

content_blocks.heading: Find the perfect plan for your business
content_blocks.subheading: All plans include our award winning sales optimization solution to track your sales in real time.

questions.question_text: What types of payment do you accept?
questions.answer_text: Credit cards including MasterCard, Visa or American Express.

questions.question_text: Can I change my plan at a later time?
questions.answer_text: Yes, you can upgrade and downgrade your plan at anytime.

questions.question_text: Do you offer pricing for nonprofit organizations?
questions.answer_text: Yes, send us a message and we'll set you up on our nonprofit pricing.
Contact us for any further questions at john@business.com.
